name: CD Pipeline - Deploy no GitHub Pages

on:
  push:
    branches: [ "main" ]

jobs:
  deploy:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    permissions:
      contents: read
      pages: write
      id-token: write

    steps:
    - name: Checkout
      uses: actions/checkout@v3

    - name: Upload para o GitHub Pages
      uses: actions/upload-pages-artifact@v2
      with:
        path: ./site

  deploy-to-github-pages:
    needs: deploy
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    permissions:
      pages: write
      id-token: write

    environment:
      name: github-pages
      url: ${{ steps.deployment.outputs.page_url }}

    steps:
      - name: Deploy
        id: deployment
        uses: actions/deploy-pages@v2
